Hysteria:

Hysteria clambered through the long vent. Her face was covered with soot and 
grease. She had slowly been making her way through the CF for the past ten 
minutes, doing her best to reconnect what was left of certain wires. She 
stopped crawling for a few moments while she answered IR's comm. Her 
breathing was slightly labored:

"I've been trying for the past ten minutes commander. Give me a few more 
minutes, and I should have the problem fixed."

Hysteria then opened a comm to Kluster:

"First I have to disengage the lockdown, then I'll do my best to reroute 
power, but no promises. Hysteria out."

She clambered through the remaining stretch of vent and dropped into the 
damaged bridge:

"Just one more..."

Hysteria slid under the smaller, still active console and reconnected two 
frayed wire ends:

"OUCH!" Hysteria pulled back and smacked her head against the underside of 
the console. The wires had sparked her, and it hurt. She opened a comm to IR 
and Kluster:

"I'm going to attempt to disengage the lockdown, wish me luck."

Hysteria tapped out a few codes and passwords on the small console. Outside 
the extra layers of steel slide back, exposing the regular doors. The 
lockdown had been disengaged. A few seconds later Hysteria tapped out 
several more commands, and succesfully rerouted some power to the CRs. She 
opened a comm to Kluster:

"Reroute complete. There's some power, not much, but it should be enough."

Hysteria closed the comm and watched as the lights in the CF's bridge 
blinked on and off several times:

"I hope."
